Zack Huhn Chris Huntington, CISSP Mitchell S. Kominsky Rhonda Binda Joe Reinhold Russ Middleton Kevin Pressler

Vice President and General Manager of Client Services in Epsilon's Technology Services.   We deliver marketing solutions with digital experiences, email, loyalty and database services, that drive our Client’s growth.  We work with our Clients solving problems, creating transformational customer moments that generate Client’s business growth.  Focused on bringing together data and technology, allowing our Clients to activate insights in real-time through loyalty programs, email and digital media execution.  Embrace technology, data analysis, looking at the world from the customer’s perspective.  How do we make the customer’s experience simpler, more relevant and real-time?The role is Executive Team Leadership with responsibility for overall Client Satisfaction, Growth & Profitability.   The role includes Leadership, P&L Management, Operations, Strategy, Client Services and Sales.
Vice President - Data Center, Cloud & Telecom Broker

I support my Client’s decisions to reduce cost & improve service in Data Center, Cloud & Telecom Services.   I created CBRE's Telecom Brokerage Practice to support both our Client’s Real Estate & IT/Telecom decisions maximize value when made together.   My experience over the past 30 years with IT Executives enables me to be an independent/unbiased advisory analyzing all data center, telecom & cloud options and recommend the best solutions to support their IT & Business Strategy & Evolution.I am part of the world’s largest Data Center Broker Team at CBRE, offering end-to-end advisory services; strategy, acquisition and disposal, project management and facilities management.  Analyze and recommend the best vendor agnostic solutions to meet/exceed our client’s IT/data center/telecom and business requirements.  Our recommendations are based on our Client's requirements, then after analyzing all options, our clients can make the best TCO decision comparing data center build, upgrade, buy/investment, sell or lease/colocation, as well as Telecom design and pricing options.  We leverage our buying power representing client's with over 400MW, our market knowledge with over 100 CBRE Data Center Brokers around the world to identify, negotiate the best providers for our clients to select that meet their requirements, saving them time and money.

We believe that a good cup of coffee is the beginning of a great day.   Drive in for great coffee. Drive out to a great day!

PCMS offers Business Technology Solutions connecting people with Data, Automating Business Processes, and Integrated Communications delivering Faster & Better Decisions & Business Results.  Our Clients are typically utilizing about 10% of their software investment; Microsoft many times is a large part of this investment.  Our Business Technology Solutions unleash this investment to deliver 5x-10x + returns where paybacks can be in months, not years.

summary: I help clients deliver data driven technology marketing programs connecting to their customers in the moments that matter resulting in revenue growth & the highest ROI.  Global leader with Fortune 100 experience across multiple technology industries with roles including P&L, Marketing, Sales, Strategy & Operations.Mentoring is another passion I have where I mentor students at the University of Cincinnati and Xavier University. Most people don’t know I have run the New York City Marathon twice and now spend my weekends enjoying our 31 acre hobby farm and the abundance of wildlife.Specialties: Marketing Technology Solutions, Digital Transformation, Leadership, Professional Services, Outsourcing Solutions, Coach, Trainer, Project Management & Negotiations.
